# audioMessageFile

**Instance Property**

An audio recording that Siri plays to the message recipient.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var audioMessageFile: INFile? { get }
```

## Getting the Content

- **content**: The text that Siri recites to the message recipient.
